'''Possible financial aid according to the degree of autonomy assessed by the GIR grid:'''

- GIR 1 to 4: Allocation personne âgée (APA), under the authority of the Conseils départementaux, provides funding for home help, meal delivery and certain home improvements, for example; or provides funding for part of the cost of accommodation in Etablissements d'Hébergements pour personnes âgées dépendantes (EHPAD); means-tested.

- GIR 5 to 6: Possible financial aid paid by pension funds and/or mutual insurance companies on a case-by-case basis


'''Aides humaines pouvant intervenir au domicile:'''

- Surroundings: friends, family, carers, neighbours

- Social professionals: social workers, home helps, night nurses, meal delivery services

- Paramedical healthcare professionals: nurses, masseur-physiotherapists, pharmacists, speech therapists, occupational therapists, psychomotor therapists, psychologists, healthcare network workers, etc.

- Medical professionals: general practitioners, doctors in care networks


'''Technical aids:'''

- Teleassistance

- Walking aids: walker, simple cane, tripod cane

- Bedroom fittings: medical bed, anti-bedsore mattress

- Toilet fittings: handrail, toilet riser, commode chair, non-slip shower mat

- Fitting out the home: adapted telephone, adapted clock, etc.

question.title: What type of financial aid is provided for home help and meal delivery for individuals with a GIR score of 1 to 4?
question.description: Financial aid for home help and meal delivery

option_a.title: Pension funds and/or mutual insurance companies
option_a.description: Possible financial aid paid by pension funds and/or mutual insurance companies on a case-by-case basis

option_b.title: Conseils départementaux
option_b.description: Allocation personne âgée (APA) under the authority of the Conseils départementaux

option_c.title: Etablissements d'Hébergements pour personnes âgées dépendantes (EHPAD)
option_c.description: Means-tested funding for part of the cost of accommodation in EHPAD

option_d.title: Social workers and home helps
option_d.description: Social professionals providing home help and meal delivery services
